h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines
content: Trying to absorb a boss spirit early will prompt the phrase "Cannot absorb Spirit without Guidance." Not to worry, you'll be able to retrieve the Spirit once you gain the upgrade!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines'.
The content is as follows:
Trying to absorb a boss spirit early will prompt the phrase "Cannot absorb Spirit without Guidance." Not to worry, you'll be able to retrieve the Spirit once you gain the upgrade!
